page.title: 13THE M25: UPMINSTER
page.content: The{M25}is a{motorway}around London linking towns and cities all over the country.In our area it runs east of Upminster across farmland. It has six lanes:three one way and three the other.On either side of the road is a hard shoulder used for any breakdowns.Along this at 100 metre intervals are AA and RAC emergency phones. Originally to be the A16 the M25 has been built by 'Costain' but in some areas it is still under construction. When finished (by 1990) it will circle London relieving inner city traffic. Although a help to motorists ever since they opened it, the controversial road has caused many complaints from nearby inhabitants because of the noise from traffic.
